summary: This bill, the "Unleashing AI Innovation in Financial Services Act," aims to foster the development of artificial intelligence in the financial sector. It establishes AI Innovation Labs within financial regulatory agencies to allow regulated entities to experiment with AI test projects. These projects can request waivers or modifications to existing regulations through a formal application process. The bill emphasizes consumer and investor protection, and risk management. It also requires reports on the outcomes of these AI test projects to the relevant congressional committees.
